Contributors

JADE project was originally started as a joint effort between between NIER ingegneria, Università di Bologna (UNIBO) and Fusion For Energy (F4E).

Nowadays new development is mostly carried on by F4E and the United Kingdom Atomic Energy Authority (UKAEA), more specifically by the Culham Centre for Fusion Energy (CCFE).

F4E is currently acting as the project coordinator.

This activity was partially funded by Fusion For Energy under XXX-XXX-XXX contract.
